text: Michael A. Thalbourne, Ph.D., (March 24 1955 â€“ May 4 2010) was an Australian psychologist and parapsychologist. He was educated at the University of Adelaide and the University of Edinburgh. His books include: A glossary of terms used in parapsychology (2003), The common thread between ESP and PK (2004), and Parapsychology in the Twenty-First Century: Essays on the future of Psychical research (2005).Michael A. Thalbourne and Lance Storm (2005). Parapsychology in the twenty-first century: essays on the future of psychical research McFarland, p. 382. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2010 deaths Category:People from Adelaide Category:Psychologists Category:Australian academics Category:Scientists from South Australia Category:Australian social scientists Category:Parapsychologists Category:University of Adelaide alumni
